objects.description: [Sandworm Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0034) has used PowerShell scripts to run a credential harvesting tool in memory to evade defenses.(Citation: US District Court Indictment GRU Unit 74455 October 2020)(Citation: Dragos Crashoverride 2018)
